name: @codidact/co-design
description: Co-Design is the design and component framework for Codidact
author: luap42

scripts.symlink_sass: mkdir -p docs && (readlink docs/assets || ln -s $(pwd)/assets docs/assets) && mkdir -p dist && (readlink docs/dist || ln -s $(pwd)/dist docs/dist)
scripts.build: npm run -s build_sass && npm run -s build_js && npm run -s symlink_sass && npm run -s symlink_js && npm run -s build_docs
